Paradise Volley

Game details
Title Paradise Volley
Created 22-04-2018
Team w84death, WrmZ
Genre Arcade
Platforms Windows 64, Linux 64
Status released

Description

Why should you play Paradise Volley?

  • Super easy rules
  • Kids friendly
  • Incredible fun game for two players

This is the version we fixed live while on expo. It is not yet pushed to the repos. It has few little bugs. Updated and fixed version will be made in few upcoming days. Stay tuned.
